alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:58PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 445 PM MST... At 357 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Sells, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Covered Wells, Gu Oidak, No:ligk, Comobabi, Cababi, San Luis - Sells District, Mountain Village and Rincon. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 90 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
